channel.title: Linux on Brain dumps and tech notes
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Brain dumps and tech notes

item.title: General
item.description: Git git remote set-url --push upstream no_push git config --global credential.helper osxkeychain git whatchanged -p --since="1 week ago" OpenSSL openssl req x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem -days 365 -nodes openssl genrsa -des3 -out rootCA.key 4096 Check cert belongs to private key openssl x509 -noout -modulus -in CERTIFICATE.crt | openssl md5 openssl req -noout -modulus -in CSR.csr | openssl md5 openssl rsa -noout -modulus -in PRIVATEKEY.key | openssl md5 sed https://www.
